Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: 門番
Entry.EnglishText: Gatekeeper

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア兵
Entry.EnglishText: Callegean Soldier

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: ラジルダ
Entry.EnglishText: Razilda

Entry.JapaneseText: ラジルダ
Entry.EnglishText: Razilda

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマ族長の家
Entry.EnglishText: Huma Chief's House

Entry.JapaneseText: イーガの家
Entry.EnglishText: Iger's House

Entry.JapaneseText: すまない……おれが余計な事 言っちまったために……
Entry.EnglishText: Sorry... If it wasn't for me and my big mouth...

Entry.JapaneseText: 心を鎮められる薬がある事は わかったんだ。 今は手に入れる方法を考えよう。
Entry.EnglishText: At least we now know that the medicine does in fact exist. Now we just need to figure out how to get some.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、どうやって……
Entry.EnglishText: Yes, but how...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……って話を、<Claire>さんが 聞き出してくれたってワケ。
Entry.EnglishText: ...And that's what we learned, thanks to Claire getting him to talk.

Entry.JapaneseText: クレアが？
Entry.EnglishText: ...She did that?

Entry.JapaneseText: クレアはとても上品で イーガのお気に召したらしいわよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Iger seemed to be taken in by her graceful manners.

Entry.JapaneseText: そうそう、すごかったんだヨ！ なんかさ、女王さまみたいな しゃべり方でさ、とっても 立派だったもん。
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, she was so cool! You'd have thought she was a queen with how eloquently she spoke!

Entry.JapaneseText: クレアが？
Entry.EnglishText: ...She did that?

Entry.JapaneseText: うん、 <Hilda>とは大違い！
Entry.EnglishText: Yep, quite unlike <Hilda> over here!

Entry.JapaneseText: い、いいえ……よそ行きの 話し方をしただけですわ……
Entry.EnglishText: N-Nonsense... I was merely demonstrating proper etiquette...

Entry.JapaneseText: 結局、「地図」も「カギ」も 見つからなかったわけか……
Entry.EnglishText: Well, in the end, we were unable to locate the map and the key...

Entry.JapaneseText: もうお手上げって感じだネ。
Entry.EnglishText: Guess it's time to throw in the towel.

Entry.JapaneseText: 一度、宿屋に戻って、 よく考えてみたほうが よさそうね。
Entry.EnglishText: Well, it might be good to go back to the inn and think things over.

Entry.JapaneseText: とにかく、ガジュマの族長にも 話を聞いてみる必要が ありそうだな。
Entry.EnglishText: Anyway, I suppose I'll have to talk to the Gajuma Chieftain now.

Entry.JapaneseText: イーガ様は ガジュマとはお会いにならん！ あっち行け！
Entry.EnglishText: Chief Iger will not meet with Gajuma! Go away!

Entry.JapaneseText: 今はイーガ様は外出中だ。 出直してこい！
Entry.EnglishText: Chief Iger is currently out right now. Come back later.

Entry.JapaneseText: 現在、ヒューマ族長イーガの息子、 イゴルに父親の事を聞いている。
Entry.EnglishText: We are currently interrogating Igor, the son of the Huma Chieftan Iger, about his father.

Entry.JapaneseText: 用事があるなら、 後ほど出直して来い。
Entry.EnglishText: If you have business with him, come back later.

Entry.JapaneseText: イーガとフォグマ、 二人の族長がいなくなっても この街の対立関係は収まらない。
Entry.EnglishText: Even with the two chieftans, Iger and Fogma, gone, the conflict in this city has yet to end.

Entry.JapaneseText: どうなっているんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: Just what is wrong with this town...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ラジルダの警備を強化するよう 将軍からの命令があった。
Entry.EnglishText: We received an order from the General to strengthen our security here in Razilda.

Entry.JapaneseText: 治安を乱す者は、その関係者も 厳重に取り締まる。 くれぐれも馬鹿な真似はするな。
Entry.EnglishText: Anyone who disturbs public order will be dealt with severely. Don't do anything foolish.

Entry.JapaneseText: イーガの屋敷は現在、 我が軍の管理下だ。
Entry.EnglishText: Iger's villa is now under the jurisdiction of the military.

Entry.JapaneseText: 後ほど家宅捜索が 行われる事になっているから 現場を荒らさぬようにな。
Entry.EnglishText: We will be searching the residence later, so don't disturb the scene.

Entry.JapaneseText: ここはヒューマの族長、 イーガ様の家だ。 失礼のないようにな。
Entry.EnglishText: This is the home of Chief Iger, the Huma Chieftain. Please watch your manners.

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえらを通さないよう、 イーガ様に言いつかっている。 帰った、帰った！
Entry.EnglishText: I've been instructed by Chief Iger to not to let you pass. Go! Leave at once!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマとなど 口もききたくないわ！
Entry.EnglishText: I do not wish to speak with Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: ラジルダの旗？
Entry.EnglishText: The Razildan Flag?

Entry.JapaneseText: そんなもんはもう残っとらん。 帰った帰った。
Entry.EnglishText: There are none left. Now go on, get out of here.

Entry.JapaneseText: イーガ様に何か用か？
Entry.EnglishText: What business do you have with Chief Iger?

Entry.JapaneseText: ラジルダの歴史について、 イーガ様にお聞きしたい事があるの。
Entry.EnglishText: We're here to ask him about Razilda's history.

Entry.JapaneseText: そうか、いいだろう。 ただし、そこのガジュマを 通すわけには行かない。
Entry.EnglishText: Very well. You may enter, but the Gajuma stays outside.

Entry.JapaneseText: わかった。 俺はここで待つ事にする。
Entry.EnglishText: That's fine. I'll wait out here.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Annie>、<Tytree>、 オレたちもここに残るべきだ。
Entry.EnglishText: ...<Annie>, <Tytree>, we ought to wait this one out too.

Entry.JapaneseText: どうして？
Entry.EnglishText: Why's that?

Entry.JapaneseText: 秘薬を取りに来た時に 色々あったんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: A lot went down when we asked him for the medicine.

Entry.JapaneseText: そうか。それなら、<Mao>、 ひとりで行けるか？
Entry.EnglishText: I see. Would you be able to go in by yourself, <Mao>?

Entry.JapaneseText: なんかボク、コドモ扱い されてるみたいなんですけど？
Entry.EnglishText: Why do I get the feeling that I'm being treated like a kid?

Entry.JapaneseText: コドモでしょ？ 私がついて行くわ。
Entry.EnglishText: Probably because you are one. I'll go with you.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>さんが？
Entry.EnglishText: You're going too, <Hilda>?

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマに見えない？
Entry.EnglishText: Do I not pass for a Huma?

Entry.JapaneseText: い、いえ、その…… ごめんなさい。
Entry.EnglishText: ...N-No, that's not what I... I apologize.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……行きましょう、<Mao>。
Entry.EnglishText: ...Let's go, <Mao>.

Entry.JapaneseText: ねえ、クレアさんも行かない？ ボク、<Hilda>と二人で行くのは イヤなんですけど？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey Claire, why don't you come along, too? I kinda don't want to go in there with only Hilda by my side.

Entry.JapaneseText: コドモ扱いされて怒るなんて、 ますますコドモね。
Entry.EnglishText: Whining about being treated like a child just makes you more of a child.

Entry.JapaneseText: ふん！ どーせコドモですよーだ！ 行こうよ、クレアさん。
Entry.EnglishText: Hmph! Well fine then, I guess I am just a kid! Let's go, Claire!

Entry.JapaneseText: は、はい…… では、私も……
Entry.EnglishText: Y-Yes... Coming...

Entry.JapaneseText: じゃあ、行ってくるわ。
Entry.EnglishText: We won't be long.

Entry.JapaneseText: オレたちはここに残る。 <Mao>、おまえたちだけで 行ってきてくれ。
Entry.EnglishText: We'll be right here. You guys can go on without us.

Entry.JapaneseText: オッケー！
Entry.EnglishText: Sure thing!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマは あっち行った!!
Entry.EnglishText: The Gajuma went that way!

Entry.JapaneseText: うるさい、ヒューマでも おまえらはイーガ様には 会わせられん！
Entry.EnglishText: Quit bothering me. Even though you're Huma, I'm not letting you meet with Chief Iger!

Entry.JapaneseText: 花？ 花は花屋に 決まってるだろう!?
Entry.EnglishText: Flowers? Why don't you go to the florist for those?!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマが何の用だ。 ヒューマ以外の者を 通す訳には行かない。
Entry.EnglishText: What business would a Gajuma have here? Besides, only Huma are allowed inside.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマを連れたヒューマを 入れるわけにはいかない。
Entry.EnglishText: I can't let you in if you're traveling with that Gajuma.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
